classSpec.desc: groups those elements which can occur at the level of individual words or phrases.
agrupa los elementos que pueden aparecer en el nivel de palabras o sintagmas.
raggruppa gli elementi che appaiono a livello di singole parole o sintagmi

remarks.p: This class of elements can occur only within larger elements of the class inter or chunk. In prose, this means these elements can occur within paragraphs, list items, lines of verse, etc.
